## ./pachctl list-repo

Return all repos.

### Synopsis


Return all repos.

```
./pachctl list-repo
```

### Options

```
  -p, --provenance value   list only repos with the specified repos provenance (default [])
      --raw                disable pretty printing, print raw json
```
